title: The QSS nerf is a lever for balancing Zed in the future
body:
Zed has to get some strength besides his ult because otherwise, he would have nothing. You buy {{item:3140}} and he becomes useless.

Now that {{item:3140}} in not a problem for Zed, Riot can find good ways to balance him, probably by nerfing his poke or waveclear.
It's the same for {{item:3147}}. It's a balancing lever.

But don't expect these changes soon. Riot still needs to think about what and how he should be nerfed. Yes, he will be OP for a time, but it is a necessary evil for getting the game balanced.

They should have just made it remove either Hard CC or Soft CC. If they want an item to remove some ultimate's like Zed/Fizz/Fiora  they should just make that item that both AP and AD can use.

Hard CC=Stun and the like.(anything that makes your champion interactive for a few seconds)
Soft CC= slow and the like.(anything that slows down your champion for a few seconds)

I think a large part of the problem that people have is the unfairness of the balance team.

Most people hate playing against Zed and feel he's an unhealthy champion.  Riot despond by removing some of his direct counters, with the aim of potentially making him more balanceable later.

However, when other champions were strong, such as Soraka mid, lane Lulu, Eve mid, AP Ezreal with Runeglaive, various others - which people also hated, they were quickly gutted until they were unviable, and then later, reworked to be more healthy (I guess.)

Personally (and I'm *very* sure a lot of you will disagree with this last), I find Zed less fun to play against than I ever found any of those above champions, yet he's the one who's allowed to remain there, to be very slowly reworked/buffed rather than gutted to take him out of the game until they can fix him properly.

Simple nerf to zed

Remove damage amp on his R but it attaches a living shadow to the enemy champion for 4/seconds, jumping to this shadow is done by reactivating R and can be done at an energy cost of 30/20/10 with no CD until the 4 seconds is up

This gives zed more mobility while cutting out the damage

He keeps the momentary target drop, he keeps the jump on target, and he can jump back on them because a shadow is attached to them

He loses the damage after X seconds but gets much more reliable sticking power to his chosen target

I don't get how Duskblade is a good balancing lever for Zed. For other assassins, maybe, if you want them to rely on it for assassination then sure, but so far that's not working out. And as for duskblade Zed, it just makes his Death mark so much more obnoxious because the first explosion fuels the second which makes even bad attempts work out.

The pain of seeing duskblade explode and suddenly gaining the "you're dead now" marker of deathmark is real.

Meanwhile, preemptive nerf hammahs for lots of other champions that get 'potential buffs' through things such as the mastery system, or the item system.

How long are we going to wait for these 'nerfs' to be implemented?
